Individual trade data

Source: R/trades.R
trades.Rd

trades() retrieves data regarding individual trades that have been executed on the exchange.

trades(
  symbol = "XBTUSD",
  count = 1000,
  reverse = "true",
  filter = NULL,
  columns = NULL,
  start = NULL,
  startTime = NULL,
  endTime = NULL,
  use_auth = FALSE
)

Arguments

symbol

a character string for the instrument symbol. Use available_symbols() to see available symbols.
count

an optional integer to specify the number of rows to return. Maximum of 1000 (the default) per request.
reverse

an optional character string. Either "true" of "false". If "true", result will be ordered with starting with the newest (defaults to "true").
filter

an optional character string for table filtering. Send JSON key/value pairs, such as "{'key':'value'}". See examples.
columns

an optional character vector of column names to return. If NULL, all columns will be returned.
start

an optional integer. Can be used to specify the starting point for results.
startTime

an optional character string. Starting date for results in the format "yyyy-mm-dd" or "yyyy-mm-dd hh-mm-ss".
endTime

an optional character string. Ending date for results in the format "yyyy-mm-dd" or "yyyy-mm-dd hh-mm-ss".
use_auth

logical. Use TRUE to enable authentication with API key.

Value

trades() returns a data.frame containing:

  • timestamp: POSIXct. Date and time of trade.

  • symbol: character. The instrument ticker.

  • side: character. Whether the trade was buy or sell.

  • size: numeric. Size of the trade.

  • price: numeric. Price the trade was executed at

  • tickDirection: character. Indicates if the trade price was higher, lower or the same as the previous trade price.

  • trdMatchID: character. Unique trade ID.

  • grossValue: numeric. How many satoshi were exchanged. 1 satoshi = 0.00000001 BTC.

  • homeNotional: numeric. BTC value of the trade.

  • foreignNotional: numeric. USD value of the trade.

References

https://www.bitmex.com/api/explorer/#!/Trade/Trade_get

Examples

# \donttest{
# Return 1000 most recent trades for symbol "XBTUSD".
trades(symbol = "XBTUSD", count = 10)
#>              timestamp symbol side  size  price tickDirection
#> 1  2020-05-25 15:27:30 XBTUSD Sell  5936 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 2  2020-05-25 15:27:30 XBTUSD Sell 14064 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 3  2020-05-25 15:27:29 XBTUSD Sell  6936 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 4  2020-05-25 15:27:29 XBTUSD Sell 16000 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 5  2020-05-25 15:27:29 XBTUSD Sell  7064 8760.0     MinusTick
#> 6  2020-05-25 15:27:27 XBTUSD  Buy 38000 8760.5      PlusTick
#> 7  2020-05-25 15:27:22 XBTUSD Sell 10936 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 8  2020-05-25 15:27:22 XBTUSD Sell  9064 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 9  2020-05-25 15:27:22 XBTUSD Sell     1 8760.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 10 2020-05-25 15:27:22 XBTUSD Sell     1 8760.0     MinusTick
#>                              trdMatchID grossValue homeNotional foreignNotional
#> 1  b2f75506-2c51-04c9-c8a9-36b6cbd48a8d   67765376   0.67765376            5936
#> 2  f4029aec-8bb7-ded9-3f5e-85c119e073aa  160554624   1.60554624           14064
#> 3  99b65d02-bf11-7950-d7f7-f6120f424b54   79181376   0.79181376            6936
#> 4  997891dc-58be-c57c-9fac-3979f79fc30e  182656000   1.82656000           16000
#> 5  6910d722-f412-4c42-c2a8-d304d4cdf1cf   80642624   0.80642624            7064
#> 6  4f6ba46f-6360-a520-694e-a7724951e908  433770000   4.33770000           38000
#> 7  a6eb7a96-3b3d-5387-2985-ed85a1e38b8a  124845376   1.24845376           10936
#> 8  7f991d6b-b5ce-dc4d-b840-a8eb46c2d353  103474624   1.03474624            9064
#> 9  eb935c7f-d489-dc4c-e032-148edb4b8fb1      11416   0.00011416               1
#> 10 a367e961-513a-38a6-c77b-33e43428aea6      11416   0.00011416               1

# Use filter for very specific values: Return trade data executed at 12:15.
trades(
  symbol = "XBTUSD",
  filter = "{'timestamp.minute':'12:15'}",
  count = 10
)
#>              timestamp symbol side size  price tickDirection
#> 1  2020-05-25 12:15:58 XBTUSD  Buy 1000 8745.5 ZeroMinusTick
#> 2  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell  100 8745.5 ZeroMinusTick
#> 3  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell   40 8745.5     MinusTick
#> 4  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell   60 8746.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 5  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell  100 8746.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 6  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell   25 8746.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 7  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell   22 8746.0     MinusTick
#> 8  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell   36 8747.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 9  2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell    1 8747.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 10 2020-05-25 12:15:57 XBTUSD Sell   12 8747.0 ZeroMinusTick
#>                              trdMatchID grossValue homeNotional foreignNotional
#> 1  5fa82cca-09af-2ae9-0e57-45b47338d443   11434000   0.11434000            1000
#> 2  d2458098-6349-41ee-1d14-af9e384b2d0c    1143400   0.01143400             100
#> 3  9fdd4c0a-9cc2-daff-9eb5-3896d32a4bad     457360   0.00457360              40
#> 4  ca66e7e9-2e8d-700e-9bce-e26f3619d70b     686040   0.00686040              60
#> 5  89913c72-131b-e21e-e9cf-230b3fb6c752    1143400   0.01143400             100
#> 6  0c382b42-def9-6eaa-c4d8-71ece0997cea     285850   0.00285850              25
#> 7  e7a0068c-0b73-f53b-a121-7ab6e9a7dc99     251548   0.00251548              22
#> 8  c844e881-4f66-0e2c-94a5-063b595250ae     411552   0.00411552              36
#> 9  24da555d-df36-e058-9a5b-86a832cb18b1      11432   0.00011432               1
#> 10 46c7beea-749e-56ab-fb72-b12af5bb4073     137184   0.00137184              12

# Also possible to combine more than one filter.
trades(
  symbol = "XBTUSD",
  filter = "{'timestamp.minute':'12:15', 'size':10000}",
  count = 10
)
#>              timestamp symbol side  size  price tickDirection
#> 1  2020-05-25 12:15:35 XBTUSD  Buy 10000 8747.5  ZeroPlusTick
#> 2  2020-05-25 12:15:35 XBTUSD  Buy 10000 8747.0  ZeroPlusTick
#> 3  2020-05-25 12:15:09 XBTUSD  Buy 10000 8744.0  ZeroPlusTick
#> 4  2020-05-24 12:15:59 XBTUSD Sell 10000 9120.0 ZeroMinusTick

#> 6  2020-05-24 12:15:06 XBTUSD Sell 10000 9129.0 ZeroMinusTick
#> 7  2020-05-24 12:15:04 XBTUSD Sell 10000 9129.0 ZeroMinusTick

#> 10 2020-05-22 12:15:50 XBTUSD  Buy 10000 9166.0  ZeroPlusTick
